octomod:StrikeDefend.NAME: Strike/Defend
octomod:StrikeDefend.DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M!: NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block.

octomod:InkSpray.NAME: Ink Spray
octomod:InkSpray.DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M!: NL Apply 1 Weak. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable.

octomod:OctoBoost.NAME: Octo Boost
octomod:OctoBoost.DESCRIPTION: Next time you octomod:Choose, octomod:Choose 1 additional time.

octomod:Forethink.NAME: Forethink
octomod:Forethink.DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M!: NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !B! Block next turn.

octomod:Lash.NAME: Lash
octomod:Lash.DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M!: NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

octomod:Writhing.NAME: Writhing Wrath
octomod:Writhing.DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M!: NL Deal !secondDamage! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

octomod:BlastSmash.NAME: Blast Smash
octomod:BlastSmash.DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M!: NL Deal !D! damage. NL Lose 2 HP and deal !secondDamage! damage.

octomod:TwinSting.NAME: Twin Sting
octomod:TwinSting.DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M!: NL Deal !D! damage and apply 1 Weak. NL Gain !B! Block and apply 1 Vulnerable.

octomod:Strangle.NAME: Strangle
octomod:Strangle.DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M!: NL Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !octoMagic! octomod:Constricted.

octomod:KrakenForm.NAME: Kraken Form
octomod:KrakenForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you octomod:Choose, octomod:Choose 1 additional time.

octomod:Adaptoform.NAME: Adaptoform
octomod:Adaptoform.DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose X + !M!: NL Gain 1 Strength. NL Gain 1 Dexterity.

octomod:TreasureChest.NAME: Treasure Chest
octomod:TreasureChest.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Exhaust. NL octomod:Choose !M!: NL Heal 5 HP. NL Gain 10 Gold. NL Obtain a random potion.

octomod:DeepThought.NAME: Deep Thought
octomod:DeepThought.DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M!: NL Gain [E] . NL Draw 1 card. NL Next turn, gain [E] . NL Next turn, draw 1 additional card.

octomod:Tangle.NAME: Tangle
octomod:Tangle.DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M!: NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !octoMagic! octomod:Constricted.

octomod:Ensnare.NAME: Ensnare
octomod:Ensnare.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL octomod:Choose !M!: NL Double the enemy's octomod:Constricted.

octomod:Influx.NAME: Influx
octomod:Influx.DESCRIPTION: Next time you octomod:Choose, octomod:Choose 2 additional times. NL Exhaust.
octomod:Influx.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next time you octomod:Choose, octomod:Choose 2 additional times. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

octomod:Indecisive.NAME: Indecisiveness
octomod:Indecisive.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you octomod:Choose this turn, trigger the effects of ALL options. NL Exhaust.

octomod:ExtraArm.NAME: Extra Arm
octomod:ExtraArm.DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M!: NL At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card. NL The first octomod:Choose card you play each turn has 1 additional choice.

octomod:SelfInterest.NAME: Self Interest
octomod:SelfInterest.DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M!: NL Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade a random card in your hand.
octomod:SelfInterest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M!: NL Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade a card in your hand.

octomod:OctoSlam.NAME: Octo Slam
octomod:OctoSlam.DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M!: NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !secondDamage! damage and gain [E] .

octomod:Conjure.NAME: Conjure
octomod:Conjure.DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M!: NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Apply 1 Weak. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable.

octomod:StingSlap.NAME: Sting Slap
octomod:StingSlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL octomod:Choose !M!: NL Apply 2 octomod:Constricted. NL Gain 2 Temporary_HP.

octomod:SpecialSkill.NAME: Special Skill
octomod:SpecialSkill.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL octomod:Choose !M!: NL Gain 1 Artifact. NL Enemy loses 1 Strength. NL Gain 1 Thorns.

octomod:BigHug.NAME: Big Hug
octomod:BigHug.DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M!: NL Apply 2 octomod:Constricted to ALL enemies. NL Draw 1 card.

octomod:OctoWrath.NAME: Eightfold Wrath
octomod:OctoWrath.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL octomod:Choose !M!: NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card. NL Apply 1 Weak. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable. NL Apply 1 octomod:Constricted. NL Gain 1 Temporary_HP. NL Gain 2 Gold.

octomod:Choke.NAME: Choke
octomod:Choke.DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M!: NL Apply 3 octomod:Constricted. NL Activate the enemy's octomod:Constricted.

octomod:Prepare.NAME: Prepare
octomod:Prepare.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next time you octomod:Choose, octomod:Choose 1 additional time. NL Exhaust.
octomod:Prepare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next time you octomod:Choose, octomod:Choose 1 additional time.

octomod:LeechingAcid.NAME: Leeching Acid
octomod:LeechingAcid.DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M!: NL Gain 1 Strength. NL Enemy loses 1 Strength. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

octomod:Crampage.NAME: Crampage
octomod:Crampage.DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M!: NL Deal !D! damage. NL Increase this card's damage by !octoMagic! this combat.

octomod:Coil.NAME: Grand Fin-ale
octomod:Coil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL octomod:Choose !M!: NL Deal !secondDamage! damage.

octomod:DecisiveHit.NAME: Decisive Hit
octomod:DecisiveHit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next time you octomod:Choose this turn, octomod:Choose 1 additional time.
octomod:DecisiveHit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next time you octomod:Choose, octomod:Choose 1 additional time.

octomod:SqueezeTighter.NAME: Squeeze Tighter
octomod:SqueezeTighter.DESCRIPTION: Can be upgraded any number of times. NL Apply !M! Constricted.

octomod:Tighten.NAME: Tighten
octomod:Tighten.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if ALL enemies are octomod:Constricted. NL Apply !M! octomod:Constricted to ALL enemies. NL Draw 1 card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Some have still evaded my grasp...

octomod:ArmTangle.NAME: Arm Tangle
octomod:ArmTangle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL octomod:Choose !M!: NL Lose 3 HP. NL Draw 1 less card next turn.

octomod:VengeSplash.NAME: Vengeful Splash
octomod:VengeSplash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for every enemy slain this combat.

octomod:Flexability.NAME: Flexability
octomod:Flexability.DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M!: NL Gain 1 Strength this turn only. NL Gain 1 Dexterity this turn only.

octomod:Spines.NAME: Spines
octomod:Spines.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL octomod:Choose !M!: NL Apply 1 Weak. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable.
octomod:Spines.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL octomod:Choose !M!: NL Apply 1 Weak and 1 Vulnerable.

octomod:Consideration.NAME: Consideration
octomod:Consideration.DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M!: NL Next time you octomod:Choose this turn, octomod:Choose 1 additional time. NL Next turn, gain [E].
octomod:Consideration.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL octomod:Choose !M!: NL Next time you octomod:Choose this turn, octomod:Choose 1 additional time. NL Next turn, gain [E].

octomod:SpinyArms.NAME: Spiny Arms
octomod:SpinyArms.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply 1 octomod:Constricted.

octomod:MagnumOctopus.NAME: Magnum Octopus
octomod:MagnumOctopus.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Increase this card's Choose amount by 1 permanently. NL octomod:Choose !M!: NL Apply 2 Constricted. NL Gain !B! Block.

octomod:LongGame.NAME: Long Game
octomod:LongGame.DESCRIPTION: The next 2 times you octomod:Choose, octomod:Choose 1 additional time. Exhaust.
octomod:LongGame.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next 2 times you octomod:Choose, octomod:Choose 1 additional time. Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

octomod:Rethink.NAME: Rethink
octomod:Rethink.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL octomod:Choose !M!: NL Put a card from your draw pile on top of your draw pile. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

octomod:Foresight.NAME: Foresight
octomod:Foresight.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL octomod:Choose !M!: NL Draw 1 card. NL Next turn, draw 1 additional card.

octomod:FriendlyFeint.NAME: Friendly Feint
octomod:FriendlyFeint.DESCRIPTION: Enemy gains !B! Block. NL Apply !M! octomod:Constricted.

octomod:DoubleSlap.NAME: Double Slap
octomod:DoubleSlap.DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M!: NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 2 cards.
octomod:DoubleSlap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL octomod:Choose !M!: NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 2 cards.

octomod:InkSplat.NAME: Ink Splat
octomod:InkSplat.DESCRIPTION: Enemy becomes Stunned. NL You can't read choices until the end of your next turn. NL Exhaust.

octomod:HeadSlam.NAME: Head Slam
octomod:HeadSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Your next card with octomod:Choose has an additional option to deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

octomod:Duplicate.NAME: Duplicate
octomod:Duplicate.DESCRIPTION: The next card you play puts a copy of itself on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

octomod:HardenBody.NAME: Harden Body
octomod:HardenBody.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary_HP. NL Your next card with octomod:Choose has an additional option to gain !M! Temporary_HP.

octomod:Hindsight.NAME: Hindsight
octomod:Hindsight.DESCRIPTION: Your next card with octomod:Choose also has all the options of your last card with octomod:Choose. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I haven't played a card with Choose yet.

octomod:ShiftingOctopus.NAME: Shifting Octopus
octomod:ShiftingOctopus.DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M!: NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block. NL Apply 1 Weak. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable. NL Gain 1 Energy. NL Next turn, gain 1 Energy. NL Draw 1 card. NL Next turn, draw 1 additional card. NL Enemy loses 2 Strength this turn. NL Gain 2 Strength this turn. NL Upgrade a random card in your hand. NL Exhaust a card in your hand. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal 4 damage back. NL Randomize the cost of your hand.

octomod:DoubleDonuDeca.NAME: Donu || Deca
octomod:DoubleDonuDeca.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !octoMagic! Dazed into your draw pile. NL octomod:Choose !M!: NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Gain 3 Strength.

octomod:Tentaparty.NAME: Tentaparty
octomod:Tentaparty.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies heal 15 HP. NL Apply !M! octomod:Constricted to ALL enemies.

octomod:Adaptability.NAME: Adaptability
octomod:Adaptability.DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M!: NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

octomod:PowerPulse.NAME: Power Pulse
octomod:PowerPulse.DESCRIPTION: Next time you octomod:Choose, octomod:Choose !M! additional times. NL Exhaust.

octomod:AutoTurret.NAME: Auto-Turret
octomod:AutoTurret.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you octomod:Choose, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

octomod:LifeTap.NAME: Life Tap
octomod:LifeTap.DESCRIPTION: You may lose !octoMagic! HP, draw 1 card, and gain [E] any number of times. NL Exhaust.

octomod:HeatedShield.NAME: Heat Shield
octomod:HeatedShield.DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M!: NL Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !octoMagic! damage back.

octomod:Camouflage.NAME: Camouflage
octomod:Camouflage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Plated Armor. NL Gain !M! Malleable.

octomod:MirrorBody.NAME: Mirror Body
octomod:MirrorBody.DESCRIPTION: Grave. NL Whenever you receive damage, deal that much damage back.
octomod:MirrorBody.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you receive damage, deal that much damage back.

octomod:Dish.NAME: Dish
octomod:Dish.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Did you know: You can commission Vex to make your custom character! Contact Vex'd#2468 on Discord for more info.
octomod:Dish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: octomod:Choose !M! non-rare Octopus card(s). NL Replace this card with those ones permanently. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I can't play this card, but I can make my character idea a reality with one easy payment!

octomod:ArrowFlurry.NAME: Arrow Flurry
octomod:ArrowFlurry.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, deal !D! damage. NL Add a copy of this card into your hand. NL Exhaust.
octomod:ArrowFlurry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak. NL Add a copy of this card into your hand. NL Exhaust.

octomod:Flurry.NAME: Flurry
octomod:Flurry.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] . NL Play the top card of your draw pile. NL If it's a octomod:Choose card, octomod:Choose randomly.

octomod:Blindside.NAME: Blindside
octomod:Blindside.DESCRIPTION: Choose X + !M!: NL Randomize the costs of cards in your hand. NL Gain [E] .

octomod:BiggestHug.NAME: Biggest Hug
octomod:BiggestHug.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! octomod:Constricted. NL Apply !octoMagic! octomod:Constricted to ALL enemies.

octomod:TobeyMaguire.NAME: Tobey Maguire
octomod:TobeyMaguire.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, either gain 2 Block or deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.
octomod:TobeyMaguire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, either gain 2 Block or deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.

octomod:CannonShot.NAME: Cannon Shot
octomod:CannonShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !secondDamage! damage to this Act's boss. NL Exhaust.
